verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the heads<WH7218> of their fathers' [households] and the genealogical<WH3187> enrollment<WH3187> of those who went<WH5927> up with me from Babylon<WH894> in the reign<WH4438> of King<WH4428> Artaxerxes: <WH783>
of the sons<WH1121> of Phinehas,<WH6372> Gershom;<WH1647> of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar,<WH385> Daniel;<WH1840> of the sons<WH1121> of David,<WH1732> Hattush;<WH2407>
of the sons<WH1121> of Shecaniah<WH7935> [who was] of the sons<WH1121> of Parosh,<WH6551> Zechariah<WH2148> and with him<WH150> males<WH2145> [who were in] the genealogical<WH3187> list;<WH3187>
of the sons<WH1121> of Pahath-moab, Eliehoenai<WH9018> the son<WH1121> of Zerahiah<WH2228> and<WH200> males<WH2145> with him;
of the sons<WH1121> of Shecaniah,<WH7935> the son<WH1121> of Jahaziel<WH3166> and<WH300> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Adin,<WH5720> Ebed<WH5651> the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> and<WH50> <WH2572> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Elam,<WH9405> Jeshaiah<WH3470> the son<WH1121> of Athaliah<WH6271> and<WH70> <WH7657> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Shephatiah,<WH8203> Zebadiah<WH2069> the son<WH1121> of Michael<WH4317> and<WH80> <WH8084> males<WH2145> with him;
of the sons<WH1121> of Joab,<WH3097> Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel<WH3171> and<WH218> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Shelomith,<WH8019> the son<WH1121> of Josiphiah<WH3131> and<WH160> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Bebai,<WH893> Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Bebai<WH893> and<WH28> <WH6242> <WH8083> males<WH2145> with him;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Azgad,<WH5803> Johanan<WH3076> the son<WH1121> of Hakkatan<WH6997> and<WH110> males<WH2145> with him;

and of the sons<WH1121> of Adonikam,<WH140> the last<WH314> ones,<WH314> these<WH428> being their names,<WH8034> Eliphelet,<WH467> Jeuel,<WH3262> and Shemaiah<WH8098> and<WH60> <WH8346> males<WH2145> with them;
and of the sons<WH1121> of Bigvai,<WH902> Uthai<WH5793> and Zabbud<WH2072> and<WH70> <WH7657> males<WH2145> with them.

Now I assembled<WH6908> them at the river<WH5104> that runs<WH935> to Ahava,<WH163> where<WH8033> we camped<WH2583> for three<WH7969> days;<WH3117> and when I observed<WH995> the people<WH5971> and the priests,<WH3548> I did not find<WH4672> any<WH4480> Levites<WH1121> <WH3881> there.<WH8033>

So I sent<WH7971> for Eliezer,<WH461> Ariel,<WH739> Shemaiah,<WH8098> Elnathan,<WH494> Jarib,<WH3402> Elnathan,<WH494> Nathan,<WH5416> Zechariah,<WH2148> and Meshullam,<WH4918> leading<WH7218> men,<WH7218> and for Joiarib<WH3080> and Elnathan,<WH494> teachers.<WH995>

And I sent<WH3318> them to Iddo<WH112> the leading<WH7218> man<WH7218> at the place<WH4725> Casiphia;<WH3703> and I told<WH7760> <WH1697> <WH6310> them what<WH1697> to say<WH1696> to Iddo<WH112> [and] his brothers,<WH251> the temple<WH5411> servants<WH5411> at the place<WH4725> Casiphia,<WH3703> [that is,] to bring<WH935> ministers<WH8334> to us for the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>

And according to the good<WH2896> hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> upon us they brought<WH935> us a man<WH376> of insight<WH7922> of the sons<WH1121> of Mahli,<WH4249> the son<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> the son<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> namely Sherebiah,<WH8274> and his sons<WH1121> and brothers,<WH251> 18<WH8083> <WH6240> men;
and Hashabiah<WH2811> and Jeshaiah<WH3470> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> with his brothers<WH251> and their sons,<WH1121> 20<WH6242> men;

and<WH220> of the temple<WH5411> servants,<WH5411> whom<WH7945> David<WH1732> and the princes<WH8269> had given<WH5414> for the service<WH5656> of the Levites,<WH3881> all<WH3605> of them designated<WH9344> by name.<WH8034>

Then I proclaimed<WH7121> a fast<WH6685> there<WH8033> at the river<WH5104> of Ahava,<WH163> that we might humble<WH6031> ourselves before<WH6440> our God<WH430> to seek<WH1245> from Him a safe<WH3477> journey<WH1870> for us, our little<WH2945> ones,<WH2945> and all<WH3605> our possessions.<WH7399>

For I was ashamed<WH954> to request<WH7592> from the king<WH4428> troops<WH2428> and horsemen<WH6571> to protect<WH5826> us from the enemy<WH340> on the way,<WH1870> because<WH3588> we had said<WH559> to the king,<WH4428> "The hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> is favorably<WH9186> disposed<WH9186> to all<WH3605> those who seek<WH1245> Him, but His power<WH5797> and His anger<WH639> are against<WH5921> all<WH3605> those who forsake<WH5800> Him."
So we fasted<WH6684> and sought<WH1245> our God<WH430> concerning<WH5921> this<WH2088> [matter,] and He listened<WH6279> to our entreaty.<WH6279>
Then I set<WH914> apart<WH914> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> of the leading<WH8269> priests,<WH3548> Sherebiah,<WH8274> Hashabiah,<WH2811> and with them ten<WH6235> of their brothers;<WH251>

and I weighed<WH8254> out to them the silver,<WH3701> the gold,<WH2091> and the utensils,<WH3627> the offering<WH8641> for the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430> which the king<WH4428> and his counselors<WH3289> and his princes,<WH8269> and all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> present<WH4672> [there,] had offered.<WH7311>

Thus I weighed<WH8254> into their hands<WH3027> <WH650> talents<WH3603> of silver,<WH3701> and silver<WH3701> utensils<WH3627> [worth]<WH100> talents,<WH3603> [and]<WH100> gold<WH2091> talents,<WH3603>
and 20<WH6242> gold<WH2091> bowls,<WH3713> [worth] 1000 darics;<WH150> and two<WH8147> utensils<WH3627> of fine<WH2896> shiny<WH6668> bronze,<WH5178> precious<WH9143> as gold.<WH2091>

Then I said<WH559> to them, "You are holy<WH6944> to the Lord,<WH3068> and the utensils<WH3627> are holy;<WH6944> and the silver<WH3701> and the gold<WH2091> are a freewill<WH5071> offering<WH5071> to the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers.

"Watch<WH8245> and keep<WH8104> [them] until<WH5704> you weigh<WH8254> [them] before<WH6440> the leading<WH8269> priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> and the heads<WH8269> of the fathers' [households] of Israel<WH3478> at Jerusalem,<WH3389> [in] the chambers<WH3957> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord.<WH3068>"

So the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> accepted<WH6901> the weighed<WH4948> out silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091> and the utensils,<WH3627> to bring<WH935> [them] to Jerusalem<WH3389> to the house<WH1004> of our God.<WH430>

Then we journeyed<WH5265> from the river<WH5104> Ahava<WH163> on the twelfth<WH8147> <WH6240> of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> to go<WH1980> to Jerusalem;<WH3389> and the hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> was over<WH5921> us, and He delivered<WH5337> us from the hand<WH3709> of the enemy<WH340> and the ambushes<WH693> by the way.<WH1870>
Thus we came<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389> and remained<WH3427> there<WH8033> three<WH7969> days.<WH3117>

And on the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> the silver<WH3701> and the gold<WH2091> and the utensils<WH3627> were weighed<WH8254> out in the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430> into the hand<WH3027> of Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the priest,<WH3548> and with him [was] Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Phinehas;<WH6372> and with them [were] the Levites,<WH3881> Jozabad<WH3107> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3091> and Noadiah<WH5129> the son<WH1121> of Binnui.<WH1131>
Everything<WH3605> [was] numbered<WH4557> and weighed,<WH4948> and all<WH3605> the weight<WH4948> was recorded<WH3789> at that time.<WH6256>

The exiles<WH1121> <WH1473> who had come<WH935> from the captivity<WH7628> offered<WH7126> burnt<WH5930> offerings<WH5930> to the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> 12<WH8147> <WH6240> bulls<WH6499> for all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> 96<WH8673> <WH8337> rams,<WH352> 77<WH7657> <WH7651> lambs,<WH3532> 12<WH8147> <WH6240> male<WH6842> goats<WH6842> for a sin<WH9128> offering,<WH9128> all<WH3605> as a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> to the Lord.<WH3068>

Then they delivered<WH5414> the king's edicts<WH1881> to the king's satraps,<WH323> and to the governors<WH6346> [in the provinces] beyond<WH5676> the River,<WH5104> and they supported<WH5375> the people<WH5971> and the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
